enhanced_posts.text:
What asshat #MikeFlood doesn't get is this: look, unfortunate circumstances, but I fell into unemployment. Hey FLOOD - YOU KNOW HOW DAMN HARD THE ECONOMY IS RIGHT NOW trying to find a job? Get a grip you fascist, #Trump boot-licking fool! All you do is spew #FoxNews lies & propaganda. 
#IWantToWork
